description:
A lie does not build a family, a mother never stops searching, and a traveling priest searches for the answer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ama no Hagoromo / Washi no Sarai Ko / Konnyaku Mondou
The Winged Robe of Heaven / The Child Kidnapped by Eagles / The Konnyaku Interrogation
天の羽衣 / 鷲のさらい子 / こんにゃく問答
